name: Sizzling Chicken Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Sizzling Chicken Recipe: Chicken 300 grams Salt ¼ tsp White pepper ¼ tsp Soya Sauce 1 tbsp Corn flour 3 tbsp Flour 2 tbsp Egg 1 Ingredients for sauce: Chili sauce 2tbsp Sweet and sour sauce 3 tbsp Oil ¼ cup White Pepper ¼ tsp Vinegar 1 tbsp Soya sauce 1 tbsp Stalk 1 cup Salt ¼ tsp Garlic (crushed) 1 tsp Green Chilies (finely chopped) 2 Spring Onion leaves (thinly sliced) ½ cup Corn flour 1 tbsp
instructions: Marinate chicken with salt. white pepper, soya sauce, corn flour, flour and egg. Mix well, then deep fry for 5 minutes and remove. Heat oil, add garlic till slightly brown. Add chopped green chilies with all the seasoning and stalk lastly add corn flour paste fried chicken. Serve on a sizzler, garnish with spring onion leaves.
